PAD_MuralHint.synopsis: Shadowheart notices the mural in the druid's grove.
PAD_MuralHint.how_to_trigger: 1. Have Shadowheart in your party2. Go to the druid's chamber in the grove3. Approach the mural with the Dark Justiciars.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The session 'PAD_MuralHint' stands alone as it only contains information regarding the condition to trigger it (having Shadowheart in your party, going to the druid's chamber, and approaching the mural). There is no indication that it either follows or causes another session, nor is there any mention of mutually exclusive conditions with other sessions.

PAD_MuralHint_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_MuralHint_0.text: That mural... they look like Dark Justiciars.

PAD_MuralHint_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_MuralHint_1.text: That mural... it shows Dark Justiciars. Another sign of their presence.

PAD_MuralHint_2.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_MuralHint_2.text: That mural shows Dark Justiciars. All these signs can't be a coincidence.
